findClasses

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Class> findClasses(java.lang.String pckgname,
                                                          boolean recur)
                                                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Gets a list of all the classes in the given package. references: http://forums.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=341935 http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/javatips/jw-javatip113.html?page=2

Parameters:
